cristal-den/chemlab/owner.ask-bid-shipment: I'm supposed to pick up a shipment for Armor Bid.
cristal-den/chemlab/owner.doctor-shipment/entry: Ah, yes, the… er… preparations. I was waiting for somepony to come pick them up. Here you go.
cristal-den/chemlab/owner.entry: Welcome to the Violet Vial. You need a little pick-me-up ?
cristal-den/chemlab/owner.trade-starting: Here's my selection. We cook everything ourselves, the product's purity is guaranteed.
